origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'StockMarketAPI.get_performance', 'description': 'This function provides the stock market performance of a company based on the company name and sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company whose stock performance is being queried.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector in which the company operates, e.g., automotive, technology.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'performance', 'description': 'The stock market performance data for the specified company and sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 StockMarketAPI.get_performance, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Tesla', 'sector'是'automotive'.
